name: Black bomber jacket
description:
A high quality fabric blocked bomber jacket.

- 100% thick cotton
- Thick insulating padding
- Gold metal zip
- Patterned, well stitched silk like lining
- One inside pocket 
- Two outer pockets
- Leather look sleeves

Perfect outer jacket to wear all year round.

name: Fabric sleeve black bomber jacket
description:
A high quality fabric blocked bomber jacket.
 
- 100% thick cotton 
- Printed sleever design
- Thick and insulating
- Half silver metal zip half pop button fastening
- Two outer pockets 
 
Perfect outer jacket to wear all year round

name: Sticker challenge- get 20% off!
description:
As part of AW13, we introduce to you our sticker challenge! Get creative and follow the steps below to get 20% off your first order:

1) Add this item into your order/ cart and checkout (1p charge)
2) We'll send you several stickers
3) Get creative, stick your stickers in your most interesting way
4) Email us a photo of your stickers!
5) We will email you a voucher code to get 20% off your first order

Perfect for laptop covers, as decoration on walls or to decorate your favourite notebook. Join the Lion & Co fan base now!

Please note, this item MUST be added into your cart in order for you to participate. There is no minimum spend to participate, sticker pack costs 1p. These stickers are not to be used for vandalism.

name: Unisex 2 piece cross jewellery set
description:
FREE SHIPPING applies to this item.

A two piece jewellery set, perfect as a stocking filler or Christmas gift. It includes:

- An adjustable cross split ring 
- A pair of cross earrings 

You can either choose metallic gold or metallic silver. Please note, the brushed gold and black versions are not available.

description:
